Big B begins Eve shoot

Amitabh Bachchan on Monday began shooting for film-maker Shoojit Sircar’s production Eve here, and shared with his fans a sneak-peek from the set. The 73-year-old tweeted on Sunday night: “And in Delhi now, with grown beard for role of new project that starts tomorrow.”

The megastar wrote in his blog: “Right now it is my stay, for the new film which starts tomorrow under the Shoojit Sircar banner... And as always there are massive apprehensions and fears as is won’t at the start of a new project,” the thespian wrote on his blog. — IANS
title: Amitabh Bachchan begins Eve shoot in Delhi
